cards.districts

Class Wonder

  • java.lang.Object
    • cards.Card
      • cards.districts.District
        • cards.districts.Wonder

  • public class Wonder
extends District
    Abstraction of the Wonder cards. Those cards have different powers. Wonders are specials districts so the class extends the District class.
    Author:
    bpotiron

    • Constructor Detail

      • Wonder

        public Wonder(java.lang.String name,
              int price,
              java.lang.String capacity,
              int supplement)
        Constructor for the Wonder class. This is the same as a district but a wonder have also a special capacity and sometimes a supplement.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the wonder
        price - the price to build a wonder
        capacity - the special power affiliate to the wonder
        supplement - the supplement of the wonder (sometimes a wonder have a better value than his real cost of construction)
